"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "./LoginPage.css" function LoginPage() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true) const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState("") const [lastName, setLastName] = useState("") const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState("") const [rememberMe, setRememberMe] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // Ici vous pourriez ajouter la logique d'authentification if (isLogin) { console.log("Login", { email, password, rememberMe }) } else { console.log("Register", { firstName, lastName, email, password, confirmPassword }) } } return (
{isLogin ? (

Welcome back

Log in to access your account

setRememberMe(e.target.checked)} />
Forgot your password? Resend email confirmation
) : (

Register

Signup now and get full access to our app.

)}
) } export default LoginPage
